    All functions

    addSpace()

    Cpmplete with space

    agrisMsg()

    generate a message

    agrisvy-class

    Create an S4 object that store information about the survey

    Create an S4 object that store information about the survey

    Goive the complete path of the anoDataDir directory

    Archive the anonymized data inside an agrisvy object

    Create anonymization script for a data file

    create_folder()

    Create a folder

    create_preproc_r()

    Create a simple preprocessing R script for a given dataset

    create_wb()

    Create an Excel file for variable classification for a given data folder

    Create folders containing working files of the workshop

    Create an object containing information for sdc report
